useLocalWhisperTip: Please make sure you have Whisper installed locally and can run the 'whisper' command in terminal
whisperCommandTip: Available variables: ${audioFile}, ${whisperModel}, ${srtFile}, ${sourceLanguage}, ${outputDir}. These will be replaced with actual values when executing.
builtinWhisperCommandTip: Available variables: ${mainPath}, ${modelPath}, ${audioFile}, ${srtFile}, ${sourceLanguage}. These will be replaced with actual values when executing.
useBatchTranslationTip: If enabled, translation takes place in full-text mode to maximize contextual accuracy.
aiPromptTip: Enter the prompt for the AI translation. Supported variables: ${content}, ${sourceLanguage}, ${targetLanguage}
restoreDefaultsDescription: Reset all settings to their default values, including translation settings and system settings. This action cannot be undone.
batchSizeTip: Due to token limits of different models, you can control how many subtitles to translate at once by splitting the full text. This controls the maximum number of subtitles per translation batch.
apiTranslationBatchSizeTip: Due to the limits of different APIs, you can control how many subtitles to translate at once. This controls the maximum number of subtitles per translation batch.
useCudaTip: Please ensure your computer supports CUDA. If enabled, it will use CUDA to accelerate translation, otherwise it will use CPU for translation.
modelsPathTip: The directory where Whisper models will be stored
